item.description:
I'm inviting you to join me and my money friends LIVE for
*1 Jammed Packed Day* where
— for the FIRST TIME —
We’ll teach you the best MONEY strategies as to HOW you can
finally BREAK FREE of giving away your power with money,
have the CONFIDENCE to handle your taxes and accounting,
PROTECT your assets, open the doors to WEALTH, and so much more…
ALL so that you can BOOST your business, income and your life.

The Women’s Financial Wellness Summit

Friday, May 11, 2012

9 AM – 4 PM

The Wyndham Hotel
Andover, MA

9:00 AM Opening Remarks and Welcome

9:10 AM Gail Kelly Get Your Ducks in A Row

9:40 AM Iris Zink Long Term Care is A Women’s Issue

10:10 AM Kerry Lekas Taxes 101

10:40 AM Break

11:00 AM Kristina Ickes Women and Wealth

11:55 AM Jenny Milana Protecting Your Family and Your Business

12:30 PM Lunch

12:50 PM Maureen Campaiola Claim Your Money Power

1:30 PM Marney McFadden Lions and Tigers and Collections, Oh my

2:00 PM Break

2:10 PM Robin Young - Now What -Handling Sudden Changes

2:40 PM Cathy Bearce The Four Cornerstones To Your Financial Future

3:30 PM Panel Discussion Open Q & A

5PM Cocktails and Networking

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: The Women's Financial Wellness Summit
